entry.title: Peak Chair Panorama Timelapse
entry.content: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/S5g6rRaP1K4?controls=0" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
entry.summary: Took this timelapse while I was working at the top of the Peak Chair in Whistler during the summer.

entry.title: Rock Paper Scissors Python Game
entry.content:
This is a Rock Paper Scissors game that I made in Python. It features user input and you get to play against the computer. A nice thing about playing against the computer is that you will never have the same choice, so the game wonâ€™t go on forever. You also have the choice of playing again without having to restart the program. You can find the source code here

Enjoy!
entry.summary: This is a Rock Paper Scissors python game. It puts you against the computer in a classic game of rock paper scissors.
